landing.bio: Im an Italian student. My tech skills includes Flutter as mobile developer and Python for server side and scripting. I use HTML, CSS and JS for web development and I’m learning about React.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for building a Flutter app using Firestore as backend for handling user’s reservations in a private gym.
Responsible for building a Flutter app using Firestore as backend for handling user’s users events for a private organization
Responsible for building an iPhone app using swift and machine learning.

education.degree: Bachelor in Data Processing Sciences And Technologies

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the summer I love traveling across the country and swimming.
interests.paragraphTwo: In the winter I follow a lot of online curses and Netflix shows, I’m a tech enthusiast and I spend a large amount of my free time trying to learn more things!

awards.awardDetail: High school diploma at 'Liceo Scientifico Salvemini'.
